main event: A UFO sighting reported as a meteor was observed by multiple witnesses in Tacoma, Washington on 20 August 1950.
interesting points: Witnesses described the object as a brilliant meteor with a white-grey tail,The object was moving at a speed three times faster than jet aircraft,Some local residents thought it could be a crashing plane,The sighting was reported widely across the Northwest,Reports indicated that the object was a solid, metallic phenomenon, identified as a fireball.
sighted object: brilliant meteor with a white-grey tail
witness description: Residents of Tacoma, including a man who saw a silver streak and thought it resembled a rocket.
